name: Cylor Vs The Passage Of Time
name_original: Cylor Vs The Passage Of Time
description:
After his many conquests across hell and beyond, Cylor finds himself thrown into a strange space between all worlds; The Passage of Time! Can he escape before his time is truly up? 

------

Originally developed for the 2022 itch.io 20 Second Game Jam

Based on a movement prototype by Nate Wiesel

"Ludum Dare 30 - Track 9" by abstractionmusic.com
